credit_line: Museum purchase from Charles E. Sampson Memorial Fund
title: "Town and Country"
description: Gourd-like form (a), having bulbous lower section tapering up to a curved neck; the rounded top with four holes set off-center; cork stopper (b).  Lustrous dark bronze "Gun Metal" glaze. Cork stopper (b) has been pushed inside of caster.
name: Pepper caster
